A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Terrible.  Made zero sense. Bombs \"dropping\" in space like there was gravity\, Leia flying\, 3 hour slow motion chase scene\, weaponizing light speed\, hologram\, Luke not wanting to be found even though he left a complicated map that would need the force to find him...I could keep going\, but I won't. Rian and Disney made a piece of crap\, with no thought or relevance.  Mindless idiots that burned a franchise.
